short_description: american cad is an architects & architectural services company based in raleigh, north carolina, united states.
long_description: american cad services provides drafting and technical staffing services to a variety of clients from small businesses to fortune 500 companies. our drafting and staffing capabilities allow the flexibility our clients need to produce the documents they require in a method that works for them. our services are tailored to meet your needs. founded in 1989 acsi has grown to be a highly respected cad service bureau. we provide drafting assistance for corporations, government, health care, and utility industries throughout the united states. located in raleigh, north carolina, we have maintained as a fundamental ideal, a demand that each client receive individualized and attentive service. whether your needs are outsource cad assistance or in-house cad personnel, acsi provides cost effective cad solutions for your project or in-house needs. our management team offers over 70 years of drafting and computer-aided-drafting experience. documents can be created for proposals, preliminary, construction, and as-built needs.
